entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
